property.name: Rules
property.value: [Trash]: Prevent a trace. That trace initiates again with a base trace strength of 0.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Saved my bacon more than once, but gives a wicked sense of deja vu." - Whizzard

property.name: Rules
property.value: 2 [Credits]: Break up to 2 code gate subroutines. 1 [Credits]: +1 strength.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It always strikes twice.

property.name: Instructions
property.value: 2 [Credits]: Break up to 2 code gate subroutines.||1 [Credits]: +1 strength.

property.name: Rules
property.value: 2 [Recurring Credits] Use these credits to trash cards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "They're mindless tools of destruction, good for little else. Nice guys, though. Some of my best friends are scrubbers." - Ji "Noise" Reilly

property.name: Rules
property.value: +1 [Memory Unit] Once per turn, you may immediately make another run when a successful run ends. Limit 1 console per player.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Twice the fun.

property.name: Rules
property.value: [Trash]: Derez a piece of ice. Use this ability only after breaking all subroutines of that ice during a single encounter.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Cyberspace's strongest glue.

property.name: Rules
property.value: [Trash]: Break any number of AP subroutines. [Trash]: Prevent any amount of net damage.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Didn't see that coming.

property.name: Instructions
property.value: [Trash]: Break any number of AP subroutines||[Trash]: Prevent any amount of net damage.

property.name: Rules
property.value: [Click], [Trash]: Gain [Click] [Click].

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I don't care what the studies show. From my experience, I can ingest three cans of Diesel an hour for up to twelve hours before going into cardiac arrest." - heard during the eleventh hour

property.name: Rules
property.value: 2 [Recurring Credits] Use these credits to install hardware.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Few corporate employees have such wide-sweeping security clearance as the janitorial staff. Most corps foolishly think they're too dim-witted to take advantage of it.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When your turn begins, gain 1 [Credits] if you have at least 2 [Link].

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "My boss rewards quality work. If you know what's good for you, you'll keep it up."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Gain 3 [Credits] and draw 1 card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Green-two clearance is the highest level of security a corp can gain access to. Legally, anyway.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Code Gate

property.name: Rules
property.value: [Subroutine] The Runner loses [Click], if able. [Subroutine] The Runner loses [Click], if able. [Subroutine] The Runner loses [Click], if able.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Time just slips away.

property.name: Rules
property.value: 2 [Recurring Credits] Use these credits to rez ice.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: so very still, even cherry blossoms are not stirred by the temple bell -Fuhaku

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Code Gate-Deflector-Psi

property.name: Rules
property.value: [Subroutine] You and the Runner secretly spend 0 [Credits], 1 [Credits], or 2 [Credits]. Reveal spent credits. If you and the Runner spent a different number of credits, move Bullfrog so that it is the outermost piece of ice protecting another server (the Runner continues the run from this new position and is now running on this new server).

property.name: Rules
property.value: [Subroutine] Trace4 - If successful, the Runner cannot make another run this turn. [Subroutine] Trace4 - If successful, end the run.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Where one thing ends, another begins.

property.name: Instructions
property.value: [Subroutine] Trace 4. If successful, the Runner cannot make another run this turn.||[Subroutine] Trace 4. If successful, end the run.

property.name: Rules
property.value: X [Recurring Credits] Use these credits during traces. X is the number of links the runner has.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: This is the net. We work here. We're cops.

property.name: Subtitle
property.value: Because We Built It

property.name: Rules
property.value: 1 [Recurring Credits] Use this credit to advance ice.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Constructing Cyberspace.

property.name: Faction
property.value: The Weyland Consortium

property.name: Rules
property.value: [Click], [Click]: Gain 4 [Credits].

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It's really hard to lose a government contract.

property.name: Faction
property.value: The Weyland Consortium

property.name: Rules
property.value: Tyrant can be advanced only while rezzed and gains "[Subroutine] End the run." for each advancement token on it.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Thou shall not pass.

property.name: Faction
property.value: The Weyland Consortium

property.name: Rules
property.value: Rez a piece of ice, ignoring all costs, and install Oversight AI on that ice as a hosted condition counter with the text "Trash host ice if all its subroutines are broken during a single encounter."

property.name: Faction
property.value: The Weyland Consortium

property.name: Rules
property.value: Forfeit False Lead: The Runner loses [Click] [Click], if able.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It didn't look like the headquarters of a multi-billion cred company. Probably because it wasn't.
